file_content.text: I hear congratulations are in order.
Yes, we finally signed the marriage agreement yesterday. She's perfect. Beauty, intelligence....
And connections. Wasn't her grandfather an overseer at the Korriban Academy?
Several of her family have been Sith. I suppose that means our children might be, too.
Why can't my family find such a match?
No idea. You could discuss it with her sister.
